page.title: 10EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Very few residents actually work in the area covered in this grid.Most tend to commute to the Potteries, Alsager, Crewe or Congleton for their employment.The largest employment found within the confines of the grid is agriculture but this only accounts for a small percentage of the total workforce. A small number of women find occupation in the local shops. In Rode Heath there is a small computer firm but the majority of its workforce comes from outside the area. There is also a haulage firm but again the workforce tend not to live in the area. Having stated this, it is important to note that unemployment is well below the national average.
